item.title: 3 Ways to Create a Heart Shape in Adobe Illustrator
item.description: It’s almost Valentine’s Day! If you’re creating your own valentines this year or have ever needed a heart shape in the past, then you know it’s not a default shape that comes with Illustrator. It can also be a little tricky to figure out using the default shapes as ‘shape builders.’ In this week’s tutorial, […]

item.title: Create a Peeling Sticker Lettering Effect in Procreate
item.description: Happy Tuesday! This week I wanted to share a tutorial from my most recent online course, 3D Lettering in Procreate. The course takes you through 5 beginner basics projects and gets you comfortable with a bunch of 3D techniques. After that, there are 6 advanced projects that combine those basic techniques while adding on new […]

item.title: Create a Bullet Journal Weekly Planner Design in Illustrator
item.description: If you’re a list maker, doodler or layout lover, chances are you’re familiar with bullet journaling.
